Queries.AdminRegister: INSERT INTO Admin (Name, Mobile, Email,Password,Gender, DoB,IsActive,Role) VALUES (@Name,@Mobile,@Email,@Password,@Gender,@DoB,@IsActive,@Role);
Queries.AdminLogin: SELECT * FROM Admin WHERE (Email=@Email AND Password=@Password AND Role=@Role)
Queries.RegisterUserEcom: INSERT INTO UserTable(Name, Mobile, Email,Password,Gender, DoB,IsActive,Role) VALUES (@Name,@Mobile,@Email,@Password,@Gender,@DoB,@IsActive,@Role);
Queries.LoginUserEcom: SELECT * FROM UserTable WHERE (Email=@Email AND Password=@Password AND Role=@Role)
